name: IGNIS FATUUS
description:
WHAT IS THIS? This demo is the beginning part of a survival horror game with a variety of monsters and a story that gets crazier the further you go in the game.  It causes the illusion of normality that suddenly in the next second you wake up in hell. I'm listing here some scenes I have in development: the hospital, the city, the sewer, the apartment, the cemetery, and hell.   SYSTEM REQUIREMENT? SAFE FILE? This game was built with Unity 2020.3.5. under Windows 10,64-bit. You gonna need at least 8GBs of RAM but preferably will be 16GBs.  Graphics API: DX10, DX11, DX12 This game is VIRUS-FREE, it was scanned with the paid version of Avira antivirus. If your Windows block the game execution file, you must accept that you want to play or pause your antivirus  STORY You will be a journalist investigating the case of the deaths of some babies in a hospital, but the situation degenerates to the point where you don't know if what is happening is real and you find no choice but just to fight and to find the way out HINT

Interact with objects around you, for example, turn on the light in a room or read a note. Be careful when you have to fight with some enemies, because in this demo there is just one autosave at the start of each new important area. COMBAT?  Attack the monster dog from behind, when he patrols in the opposite direction HOW TO PLAY? Just  unzip the game archive anywhere even on the desktop and then find the exe file from the main folder PLANS In the full game, you will get a flashlight and guns but limited ammo. There will be an automatic save before any important event. Unfortunately, I can't say when the full game will be ready  Enjoy!
